title: Cream cheese and smoked salmon spread
ingredients: ['200g cream cheese, softened', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1/2 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1/2 teaspoon savoury seasoning', 'Pinch freshly ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon dried dill', '160g smoked salmon, flaked']
